str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

word: we do not write you anything
parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: A primary verb; to 'grave', especially to write; figuratively, to describe.
Other, another (of more than two), different. A primary word; 'else, ' i.e. Different.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To read, know again, know certainly, recognize, discern. From ana and ginosko; to know again, i.e. to read.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To hope, hope for, expect, trust. From elpis; to expect or confide.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 2nd Person Plural
str2: From epi and ginosko; to know upon some mark, i.e. Recognize; by implication, to become fully acquainted with, to acknowledge.
A conjunction, preposition and adverb of continuance, until.
